name: Neon Infinity
description: 80's neon drenched, couch co-op, endless high score fest, space arcade shooter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel (R) Celeron (R) CPU N3350 @ 1.10 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics 500 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio Additional Notes: A T86 calculator could probably run this.
